project.title: Pet Putt
project.description:
!format **Pet Putt** is an adorable golf game set on spherical putting courses. My second project with the open-source Godot game engine, the game features numerous framework systems to support dialogue, procedural geometry, and interaction in a spherical play space.
A public demo will be available soon, and a full release is currently scheduled for later this year!
project.feature: Custom gradient-based lighting and distortion shaders
Camera and putting interaction systems supporting a spherical play space
